name: Mars Miner (2015)
description:
Mars Miner is an incremental/mining/idle/clicker game in which the goal is to buy upgrades with the money your earn from tapping on a planets surface. The money you earn can be used to buy more than 20 different upgrades. Every time a planet is successfully mined the next planet will be unlocked!

There are more than 50 planets which you can visit with there own background, total health, and planet bonus. A planets health will increase as you progress through the game making the challenge of completing the game even harder.
